Accessibility together.

CivicActions Accessibility is where CivicActions team members and our partners learn from and support one another to make digital government services more accessible for everyone.

Join us

We're open.

CivicActions Accessibility is an open project and community and adopts an open approach to government web accessibility. Learn more.

Contribute.

Everyone is welcome. Learn how you can contribute to CivicActions Accessibility.

Learn.

The CivicActions Accessibility Handbook help you learn more about making government digital services more accessible.
